summary: Purpose Chronic graft-versus-host disease is a severe immunological complication that occurs after allogeneic hematopoietic stem cell transplantation (HSCT) oral cGVHD occurs in >25 % of cGVHD patients and leads to decreased quality of life. targeted label-free quantification of select proteins supports the use of mass spectrometry for future validation in a large patient population. electronic supplementary material The online version of this article contains supplementary material.
